caption:
You already know of #aloevera as a soothing, calming, and refreshing ingredient for the skin, but what about #fermented aloe vera in skincare? 🌿 

What are the benefits? 

Watch as our Brand Director Custodio explains more about our new Pro-Recovery Serum formula, and how this elevated version of aloe vera helps aid in impressive skin barrier recovery.

Learn more about our new Pro-Recovery Serum via the link in bio. ✨
